metas.title: Cheltenham Gold Cup Result 2011 | Winner | Review | Places

metas.description: The full result of the 2011 Cheltenham Gold Cup at the Cheltenham Festival including starting prices and places.

page.content:
Cheltenham Gold Cup Result 2011

The 2011 Cheltenham Gold Cup will be the highlight of the week at the Cheltenham Festival and the full result will be of interest to most punters at the end of a brilliant week of racing. It is looking like a top class field for the race and just as soon as the horses cross the line we will have the result here including starting prices and places for the the top four.

The crowd roared as the old heroes Kauto Star and Denman hit the front heading to the last fence with the younger Long Run just in behind them. In the end it was Long Run who had youth on his side to take the win ahead of Denman who ran a sensational race at 11 years old with Kauto Star back in third.

Cheltenham Gold Cup Result 2011

1520 Totesport Cheltenham Gold Cup Chase3m 2½f
1. Long Run (Sam Waley-Cohen) 7-2 Fav
2. Denman (Sam Thomas) 8-1
3. Kauto Star (Ruby Walsh) 5-1
13 ran
